name: Charm
description:
This is a very short slice of life visual flash fiction about truth, lies and trying to get tips.

It's linear and won't take up much of your life (like a couple minutes maybe). But it features a cute little story, some cartoony artwork by yours truly and some excellent music by Profound Still.

It's free! But if you pay $3 or support my patreon you will get a 12-page art book which includes some making-of stuff and the full text of the story :)
